# Grounded NLP Course Paper Pre

HOLODECK: Language-Guided Generation of 3D Embodied AI Environments

## Presentation Instructions
For Mac:
```bash
brew install node
```

Clone the repository and install the `slidev` dependencies:
```bash
npm install
```

To run the presentation:
```bash
npm run dev
```

To export to PDF:
```bash
slidev export
```
